servers.description: Solace PubSub+ Cloud US EAST Region

get.description: Use this API to get a list of all environments.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of environments to get per page.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to get.

200.description: Get a list of environments and the accompanying metadata.

get.description: Use this API to get a single environment by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the environment.

200.description: The environment.

get.summary: (Beta) Get a list of event management agent regions
get.description: Use this API to get a list of event management agent regions.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of event management agent regions to get per page.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to get.

200.description: The list of event management agent regions and the accompanying metadata.

get.description: Use this API to get a list of EMAs that match the given parameters.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of EMAs to get per page.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to get.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sort based on the provided parameters.
The value can be either a standalone field name (`?sort=`) or a field and direction, delimited by a colon (`?sort=:`). If the direction is not specified, the default is ascending.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: The IDs of the EMAs.

parameters.name: createdBy
parameters.description: Match only EMAs created by this user

parameters.name: eventManagementAgentRegionId
parameters.description: Match only EMAs in the given EMA-Region

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify extra data to be included, options are: referencedByMessagingServiceIds

200.description: The list of EMAs and the accompanying metadata.

post.description: Use this API to create an EMA object.

201.description: Created an EMA. The newly saved EMA object is returned in the response body.

get.description: Use this API to get a single EMA by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the EMA object.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify extra data to be included, options are: referencedByMessagingServiceIds

200.description: The EMA object.

delete.description: Use this API to delete an EMA.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the EMA object.

patch.description: Use this API to update an EMA. You only need to specify the fields that need to be updated.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the EMA object to update.

200.description: The updated EMA object.

get.summary: (Beta) Get the raw configs in string format for an EMA object
get.description: Use this API to get the raw configs for a single EMA by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the EMA object.

200.description: The EMA config in yaml structure.

get.summary: (Beta) Get the raw configs in file format for an EMA object
get.description: Use this API to get the raw configs for a single EMA by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the EMA object.

200.description: The EMA config in a yaml file named application.yml.

get.summary: Get a list of event meshes
get.description: Use this API to get a list of event meshes that match the given parameters.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of event meshes to get per page.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to get.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the event mesh to match on.

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.description: Match only event meshes in the given environment

200.description: The list of event meshes and the accompanying metadata.

201.description: Created an event mesh. The newly saved event mesh is returned in the response body.

get.description: Get a single event mesh by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the event mesh.

200.description: The event mesh.

delete.description: Use this API to delete an event mesh.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the event mesh.

patch.description: Use this API to update an event mesh. You only need to specify the fields that need to be updated.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the event mesh to update.

200.description: The updated event mesh.

get.summary: (Beta) Get a list of messaging services
get.description: Use this API to get a list of messaging services that match the given parameters.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of messaging services to get per page.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to get.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sort based on the provided parameters.
The value can be either a standalone field name (`?sort=`) or a field and direction, delimited by a colon (`?sort=:`). If the direction is not specified, the default is ascending.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: The IDs of the messaging services.

parameters.name: messagingServiceType
parameters.description: Match only messaging services of the given type

parameters.name: runtimeAgentId
parameters.description: Match only messaging services in the given runtimeAgentId

parameters.name: eventMeshId
parameters.description: Match only messaging services in the given eventMeshId

200.description: The list of messaging services and the accompanying metadata.

post.description: Use this API to create a messaging service.

201.description: Created a messaging service. The newly saved messaging service is returned in the response body.

get.description: Use this API to get a single messaging service by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the messaging service.

200.description: The messaging service.

delete.description: Use this API to delete a messaging service.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the messaging service.

patch.description: Use this API to update a messaging service. You only need to specify the fields that need to be updated. However, if you want to update anything under subObjects (i.e. anything inside messagingServiceConnections object), you need to provide the original messagingServiceConnections with the updated fields instead of just providing the changed fields.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the messaging service to update.

200.description: The updated messaging service.

put.summary: (Beta) Initiate a scan request to run against a messaging service
put.description: Use this API to make a scan request on a messaging service.

parameters.name: messagingServiceId
parameters.description: The ID of the messaging service.

200.description: Requested a scan on the messaging service. The operation object with ID set as ID of the created scan Object is returned in the response body.

put.summary: (Beta) Remove an association between an messaging service and the requested entity
put.description: Use this API to remove the association between a messaging service and either of EVENT_MESH or EVENT_MANAGEMENT_AGENT.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the messaging service.

requestBody.description: The association object with the value matching either EVENT_MESH or EVENT_MANAGEMENT_AGENT.

200.description: The updated messaging service, e.g. if the API request body had {"association": "EVENT_MESH"} then the resulting object would not have eventMeshId attribute.

get.summary: (Beta) Get a list of messaging service scans
get.description: Use this API to get a list of messaging service scans that match the given parameters.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of messaging service scans to get per page.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to get.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sort based on the provided parameters.
The value can be either a standalone field name (`?sort=`) or a field and direction, delimited by a colon (`?sort=:`). If the direction is not specified, the default is ascending.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: The IDs of the messaging service scans.

parameters.name: messagingServiceId
parameters.description: Match only messaging service scans in the given messagingService

parameters.name: eventMeshId
parameters.description: Match only messaging service scans in the given eventMeshId

200.description: The list of messaging service scans and the accompanying metadata.

get.description: Use this API to get a single messaging service scan by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the messaging service scan.

200.description: The messaging service scan.

delete.description: Use this API to delete a messaging service scan.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the messaging service scan.

get.summary: (Beta) Get a list of messaging service scan logs
get.description: Use this API to get a list of messaging service scan logs that match the given parameters.

parameters.name: scanId
parameters.description: The ID of the messaging service scan we want logs for.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of messaging service scan logs to get per page.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to get.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sort based on the provided parameters.
The value can be either a standalone field name (`?sort=`) or a field and direction, delimited by a colon (`?sort=:`). If the direction is not specified, the default is ascending.

200.description: The list of messaging service scan logs and the accompanying metadata.

get.summary: (Beta) Get a list of messaging service scan data
get.description: Use this API to get a list of messaging service scan data that match the given parameters.

parameters.name: scanId
parameters.description: The ID of the messaging service scan we want data for.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of messaging service scan data to get per page.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to get.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The name of the field to sort on.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: The IDs of the messaging service scan data.

parameters.name: collectionTypes
parameters.description: Match only scan data whose dataCollectionType matches the given list.

200.description: The list of messaging service scan data and the accompanying metadata.

get.summary: (Beta) Get a messaging service scan data
get.description: Use this API to get a single messaging service scan data by its ID.

parameters.name: scanId
parameters.description: The ID of the messaging service scan.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the messaging service scan data.

200.description: The messaging service scan data.

description.example: Application Domain created by the Solace PubSub+ Cloud API documentation

uniqueTopicAddressEnforcementEnabled.description: Forces all topic addresses within the application domain to be unique.

topicDomainEnforcementEnabled.description: Forces all topic addresses within the application domain to be prefixed with one of the application domains configured topic domains.

description.example: Schema created by Solace PubSub+ Cloud API documentation

content.example: { "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#", "$id": "http://example.com/root.json","type": "object", "title": "An example schema", "required": [ "attribute", ], "properties": { "attribute": { "$id": "#/properties/attribute", "type": "string", "title": "An example of a string based attribute", "examples": [ "aValue" ], "pattern": "^(.*)$" } }}

messageDeliveryMode.description: The mode that will be used for message delivery (ex: `guaranteed` uses a queue)

maximumTimeToLive.description: Duration in seconds of how long a message can live in a queue

queueType.description: The arrangement of queues on a broker used for message delivery (ex: `single` uses one queue per event API version in this event API product)

maxMsgSpoolUsage.description: Total number of MBs available for the queue to use

type.description: The type of this payload, tag.

description.example: Enum created by Solace PubSub+ Cloud API documentation

filterValue.description: Different filter values separated by comma

TopicFilter.description: List of variable that contains address node name and filters
